nodes.documentation: @title Depot Contract.
nodes.name: Depot

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the funds wallet where ETH raised is held
@param _fundsWallet The new address to forward ETH and Nomins to
nodes.name: setFundsWallet

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the Oracle that pushes the havven price to this contract
@param _oracle The new oracle address
nodes.name: setOracle

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the Nomin contract that the issuance controller uses to issue Nomins.
@param _nomin The new nomin contract target
nodes.name: setNomin

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the Havven contract that the issuance controller uses to issue Havvens.
@param _havven The new havven contract target
nodes.name: setHavven

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the stale period on the updated price variables
@param _time The new priceStalePeriod
nodes.name: setPriceStalePeriod

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the minimum deposit amount required to depoist nUSD into the FIFO queue
@param _amount The new new minimum number of nUSD required to deposit
nodes.name: setMinimumDepositAmount

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Time must be later than last update"

arguments.value: Time must be later than last update

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Time must be later than last update"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Time must be less than now + ORACLE_FUTURE_LIMIT"

arguments.value: Time must be less than now + ORACLE_FUTURE_LIMIT

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Time must be less than now + ORACLE_FUTURE_LIMIT"

nodes.name: updatePrices

nodes.documentation: @notice Fallback function (exchanges ETH to nUSD)

arguments.value: ETH
nUSD

nodes.documentation: @notice Exchange ETH to nUSD.
nodes.name: exchangeEtherForNomins
exchangeEtherForNominsAtRate

arguments.value: ETH
HAV

nodes.documentation: @notice Exchange ETH to HAV.
nodes.name: exchangeEtherForHavvens
exchangeEtherForHavvensAtRate

arguments.value: nUSD
HAV

nodes.documentation:
@notice Exchange nUSD for Havvens
@param nominAmount The amount of nomins the user wishes to exchange.
nodes.name: exchangeNominsForHavvens
exchangeNominsForHavvensAtRate

nodes.documentation:
@notice Allows the owner to withdraw havvens from this contract if needed.
@param amount The amount of havvens to attempt to withdraw (in 18 decimal places).
nodes.name: withdrawHavvens

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You have no deposits to withdraw."

arguments.value: You have no deposits to withdraw.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You have no deposits to withdraw."

nodes.documentation:
@notice Allows a user to withdraw all of their previously deposited nomins from this contract if needed.
        Developer note: We could keep an index of address to deposits to make this operation more efficient
        but then all the other operations on the queue become less efficient. It's expected that this
        function will be very rarely used, so placing the inefficiency here is intentional. The usual
        use case does not involve a withdrawal.
nodes.name: withdrawMyDepositedNomins
depositNomins
tokenFallback

nodes.documentation: @notice Check if the prices haven't been updated for longer than the stale period.
nodes.name: pricesAreStale
havvensReceivedForNomins
havvensReceivedForEther
nominsReceivedForEther

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the oracle can perform this action"

arguments.value: Only the oracle can perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the oracle can perform this action"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the nomin contract can perform this action"

arguments.value: Only the nomin contract can perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the nomin contract can perform this action"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Prices must not be stale to perform this action"

arguments.value: Prices must not be stale to perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Prices must not be stale to perform this action"
